briefTitle: A Study of Verutex (Fusidic Acid), Eritex (Erythromycin) and Fisiogel in the Management of Tarceva-Associated Rash.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants Who Develop Skin Rash
outcomeMeasures.description: Skin rash was assessed by the investigator and dermatologists (the latter ones only through pictures) and scored according to (National cancer Institute -Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events ) NCI-CTCAE ( version 3 (line "Rash/desquamation" - short name "rash").

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Skin Rash Stratified by Severity Grade
outcomeMeasures.description: The severity of skin rash was graded on a 5 point scale where 0 (equals)= absent, 1= mile, 2=moderate, 3= severe, 4= life threatening and 5= Death

outcomeMeasures.title: Time to Appearance of Skin Rash
outcomeMeasures.description: Time to occurence of skin rash was calculated as the number of days from Day 0 until the first appearance of skin rash as defined by NCI-CTCAE

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Erythema
outcomeMeasures.description: Erythema is defined as redness of the skin or mucous membranes, caused by hyperemia of superficial capillaries

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Pruritus
outcomeMeasures.description: Pruritus is defined as intense localized itching

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Pain
outcomeMeasures.description: Pain is defined as an unpleasant feeling often caused by intense or damaging stimuli

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Erythema Stratified by Severity Grade
outcomeMeasures.description: The severity of skin rash was graded on a 5 point scale where 0 (equals)= absent, 1= mile, 2=moderate, 3= severe, 4= life threatening and 5= Death; Severity graded by oncologist.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Pruritus Stratified by Severity Grade
outcomeMeasures.description: The severity of skin rash was graded on a 5 point scale where 0 (equals)= absent, 1= mile, 2=moderate, 3= severe, 4= life threatening and 5= Death; Severity graded by oncologist.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Pain Stratified by Severity Grade
outcomeMeasures.description: The severity of pain was graded on a 5 point scale where 0 (equals)= absent, 1= mile, 2=moderate, 3= severe, 4= life threatening and 5= Death; Severity graded by oncologist.
